Class FileUtil

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.tools.FileUtil
public class FileUtil extends Object
Utility class for handling file operations, including reading from and writing to text files. This class provides static methods to facilitate file I/O operations in a convenient manner.

  • Method Details

    • writeTxtFile

      public static boolean writeTxtFile(String content, File fileName) throws Exception
      Writes the specified content to a text file.
      Parameters:
      content - the content to write to the file
      fileName - the file to which the content will be written
      Returns:
      true if the content was successfully written, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during file writing

    • readFileByLines

      public static List<String> readFileByLines(String fileName)
      Reads the contents of a text file line by line and returns them as a list of strings.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to read
      Returns:
      a list of strings representing the lines of the file
